game.name: Train Simulator: Salzburg - Wels Route Add-On
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Climb through the hills and valleys of Austria along the bustling Westbahn, with RSSLO’s Salzburg - Wels route for Train Simulator.
